GSD.description:
xhci: Fix null pointer dereference when host dies

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.165 by commit 081105213ff6f661c114781d469233c7d0e09c2e. For more details please see the references link.
